configFileTemplates.$CONFIG/NuGet/NuGet.Config:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<configuration>
    <packageSources>
        <clear/>
{{#repo_nuget}}
        <add key="{{name}}" value="{{url}}" />
{{/repo_nuget}}
    </packageSources>

    <config>
        <add key="defaultPushSource" value="{{nuget_push_url}}" />
    </config>
</configuration>
